item.title: CVE-2013-4584|2024-08-06T16:45:14.872Z -- perdition -- perdition
item.description: Perdition before 2.2 may have weak security when handling outbound connections, caused by an error in the STARTTLS IMAP and POP server. ssl_outgoing_ciphers not being applied to STARTTLS connections
